featured.text: In the end, Ali lost patience and went to demand his pot.
When the kernels start 38 , shake the pot to let the steam escape and to let the unpopped kernels fall to the bottom.
All that is 37 is a large, high pot, about four tablespoons of vegetable oil and a small handful of organic popcorn kernels.
The next day he returned the pot with a small one inside.

other.text: He had seen pots having babies before.
He wanted to keep the small pot.
“Well, you believed me when I told you that your pot had a baby, didn’t you?” 41.
Ali gladly agreed and waited to see if Nasreddin would again give him back two pots.
“While your pot was staying with me, it had a baby.”
“I’m sorry, your pot has died,” said Nasreddin. “Died!” said Ali.
Why did Ali take Nasreddin’s words that his pot had a baby?
Nasreddin gave Ali an extra small pot in the beginning because .
As soon as the popping slows down, 39 the pot from the stove.
One week later Nasreddin asked Ali to lend him the pot again.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於烹飪或儲存食物的容器，通常有底部和側面，並且可以加熱。
definition.en_def: A container used for cooking or storing food, typically having a bottom and sides, and can be heated.
definition.example: She boiled water in a large pot for the pasta.
